item.title: Scones and Jam
item.description: Difficulty: medium Time: 20 minutes Ingredients Scones: Self raising flour Baking powder Milk (dairy or not) (250 ml) Butter Egg (1) Ingredients Jam: Raspberries Blueberries Chia seed Agave syrup (1 tsp) Instructions:
